Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

When editing the .asl file for the game, is it possible to use 'Or' in the commands, so that the same system of responses can be true if the user types one thing or another or another?

For example, say you game has fairly loose parameters and you want the same complex sequence to play out whether the user types 'hit Bob', 'punch Bob', 'belt Bob', 'kick Bob' et cetera?
